results.summary: The agent report is accurate in identifying the root cause and provides logical reasoning, but lacks some metric details and actionable recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured most of the causal chain but did not explicitly mention CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent identified the VCORE percentage but missed specific DDR and CPU frequency metrics.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and reasoning but could improve in causal chain completeness and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM and PowerHal as root causes and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified VCORE and DDR percentages but missed specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or recommendations were provided.

results.summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and capturing causal chains, with minor omissions in metrics and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to MMDVFS and CM/PowerHal but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report accurately captured most of the key metrics but missed some CPU frequency details.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause, but could be more detailed.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The report lacks practical suggestions for fixes or historical references.
